name: Altina CELEBRATE Sparkling Brut Non-Alcoholic 750ml
description: Pop the cork and Celebrate! ALTINA Sparkling Brut is crafted in the style of a Sparkling Brut Chardonnay. With top notes of Native Australian Peach and strawberry, supported by a bright acidity and toasty vanilla notes. ALTINA gently remove the alcohol from premium Australian wine and blend it with health-giving botanicals to create a complex, delicious non-alc. experience. Pairs Perfectly with a grilled prawn and citrus salad, smoked salmon canapes, grilled vegetable platter or spinach and feta stuff mushrooms. ALTINA Sparkling Brut adds a touch of elegance and festivity, making it the perfect accompaniment to celebrations with friends, outdoor picnics, weddings and birthday parties. IngredientsDe-Alcoholised wine, filtered water, natural botanical flavours, extracts and distillates,preservatives (220, 202), citric acid, malic acid, sodium citrate.This premium de-alcoholised wine product contains less than 0.02% ABV, a level similarto natural fruit juices.

name: Altina CELEBRATE Sparkling Rose Non-Alcoholic 750ml
description: Pop the cork and Celebrate! ALTINA Sparkling Rosé is crafted with layered notes of bright crunchy fruit, tart native Rosella and a hint of citrus. Crisp, lively bubbles with a dry finish. Pop the cork and Celebrate! ALTINA gently remove the alcohol from premium Australian wine and blend it with health-giving botanicals to create a complex, delicious non-alc. experience. Pairs perfectly with salmon and avocado tartare, prosciutto-wrapped grilled asparagus and grilled vegetable galette or something sweeter like a summer berry salad, raspberry macarons or strawberry shortcake. ALTINA Sparkling Rosé adds a touch of sophistication and festivity, making it the perfect accompaniment to a Sunday brunch, bridal and baby showers or a summer garden party. Ingredients: De-Alcoholised wine, filtered water, natural botanical flavours, extracts and distillates, preservatives (220, 202), citric acid, malic acid, sodium citrate. Allergens: sulphites, capsaicinThis premium de-alcoholised wine product contains less than 0.02% ABV, a level similar to natural fruit juices. name: Altina Le Vie En Rose - Non-Alcoholic Wine Alternative
description: Delicate and crisp rose style bubbles with notes of Hibiscus, native Rosella and Rose petals. The palette is balanced with vibrant Citrus undertones to deliver a natural acidity and a fine creamy texture. The finish is dry and refreshing with lingering flavours of tart Apple and Roses. Vegan, Gluten Free. Ingredients: Filtered water, infusion of Apple and organic hibiscus flowers, natural extract of organic pink rose petals, sweet orange peel and native rosella flowers, natural extract of organic Cayenne Pepper, potassium sorbate. Per 100ml: Energy 86kJ (20Cal), Carbs 2.0g, Sugars 2.0g, Sodium 8mg. No alcohol content (0.0% ABV) About Altina Drinks: Our process starts with specially chosen air-dried botanicals that are then cold steeped for a minimum of 36 hours. We do this without the use of sugar syrup or alcohol, both of which can overpower delicate flavours and affect mouthfeel. We then triple filter out any impurities to maximise taste and visual clarity. Our alcohol-free drinks may contain small amounts of natural sugars however unlike our competitors we never ever add any cane sugar or grape juice concentrate to our products. SOLD AS: 4 x 250ml

name: Altina Liberate Collection - Non-Alcoholic Wine - 3 x 750ml
description: Altina Liberate Collection 3x750ml - Buy the Collection and Save! KAKADU PLUM ROSÉ The perfect blend of premium de-alcoholised Sauvignon Blanc, Shiraz and Native Australian Kakadu Plum. A refreshing bouquet of just- ripe strawberry and subtle pink rose. A crisp, dry finish, with a hint of spice. Pair with: Goats cheese and fig salad, crispy golden potatoes, fresh grilled fish and prawns or a thin crust Italian pizza. FINGER LIME SAUVIGNON BLANC The perfect blend of premium de-alcoholised Sauvignon Blanc and Native Australian Finger Lime. Bright aroma of white nectarine and fresh cucumber. A crisp, lingering finish underpinned with herbaceous notes. Pair with: Sage butter roast chicken, creamy smoked salmon risotto, freshly shucked oysters or a burrata salad. PEPPERBERRY SHIRAZ The perfect blend of premium de-alcoholised Shiraz and Native Australian Pepperberry. Bursting with juicy red fruits and a hint of dark chocolate. A dry, smooth finish, with notes of vanilla and layered lingering spice. Pair with: Chargrilled steak and roast vegetables, slow cooked ragù pappardelle or a selection of sharp, full flavoured cheeses. Non-alcoholic (Less than 0.5% ABV) | No added sugar | Vegan, gluten free | Handcrafted in Australia SOLD AS: 1 x 750ml KAKADU PLUM ROSÉ, 1 x FINGER LIME SAUVIGNON BLANC, 1 x PEPPERBERRY SHIRAZ

name: Altina Sansgria - Non-Alcoholic Wine
description: A lush and vibrant style of bubbles. The red colour is visually stunning. Rich dark fruits including native Australian Riberry are balanced with sweet Orange, soft vanilla and spicy notes. This drink is delicately structured, complex, slightly sweet and ultra refreshing. Ingredients: De-alcoholisted wine from shiraz grapes, filtered water, natural botanical extracts and flavours, preservatives (220,202), citric acid, tartaric acid. Per 100ml: Energy 71kJ (17 Cal), Carbs 1g, Sugars 1g, Sodium 5mg. Less than 0.2% ABV. Vegan, Gluten Free. About Altina Drinks: Our process starts with specially chosen air-dried botanicals that are then cold steeped for a minimum of 36 hours. We do this without the use of sugar syrup or alcohol, both of which can overpower delicate flavours and affect mouthfeel. We then triple filter out any impurities to maximise taste and visual clarity. Our alcohol-free drinks may contain small amounts of natural sugars however unlike our competitors we never ever add any cane sugar or grape juice concentrate to our products. SOLD AS: 4 x 250ml

name: Beneficial Beer Co Stone Cold Lager - Non-Alcoholic Beer
description: Beneficial Beer Co Stone Cold Lager <0.5% If there’s a non-alcohol lager to be tasted, this is the one. “A classic all malt non-alc lager exhibiting traditional malt & estery yeast character as well as some subtle noble hop character. Lowish body balanced with soft bitterness. Highly drinkable & beery” - Bruce Peachey, BBCo Head Brewer. Beneficial Beer Co’s Stone Cold Lager is actually made as a mid-strength, full-bodied lager brewed the traditional way with the alcohol removed via reverse osmosis filtration to make it a 0.5% non-alc. Produced using a tried and tested traditional brewing process under Brice Peachey's guidance, BBCo’s Stone Cold Lager has all the ingredients you’d expect - barley grain, water, hops and yeast. The alcohol is then removed via a unique exclusive to BBCo reverse osmosis filtration system. The Australian-made reverse osmosis machine removes the alcohol while leaving all the flavours and esters you would expect from a mid-strength Lager. The result? A familiar full-flavoured Aussie-style lager without the booze. SOLD AS: 4 x 375ml

name: Beneficial Beer Co “Wagon Driver” Pale Ale
description: Mouthwateringly tropical and delivering citrus notes in spades, you’ll discover classic cues of pine and grapefruit balanced with bitterness and caramel sweetness. 0.5% ABV 4 x 375ml

name: Bilpin Apple & Ginger Non-Alcoholic Cider
description: Straight from the Blue Mountains in NSW - Made with Bilpin Granny Smiths, Pink Lady and Red Delicious apples blended with freshly crushed ginger juice that has combined to deliver a spicy, peppery, lemony and somewhat sweet flavour, all combining into a distinctive ginger zing. SOLD AS: 6 x 330ml

name: Guinness 0.0 Non-Alcoholic Stout
description: The Guinness with everything except the alcohol. Guinness 0.0 boasts the same beautifully smooth taste, perfectly balanced flavour, and unique dark colour of Guinness, just without the alcohol. To create Guinness 0.0 the St James’s Gate brewers, start by brewing Guinness exactly as they always have, using the same natural ingredients; water, barley, hops, and yeast; before gently removing the alcohol through a cold filtration method. The cold filtration process allows the alcohol to be filtered out without presenting thermal stress to the beer, protecting the integrity of its taste and character. The brewers then carefully blend and balance the flavours to ensure the distinctive flavour profile and taste characteristics of Guinness. The resulting product is a stout that is unmistakably Guinness, just without the alcohol, featuring the same dark, ruby red liquid and creamy head, hints of chocolate and coffee, smoothly balanced with bitter, sweet and roasted notes. SOLD AS: 4 x 440ml

name: Hiatus Beers Pacific Ale - Non-Alcoholic Beer
description: Hiatus Beers Non Alcoholic Pacific Ale (NAPA) Classic pacific ale aromas of passionfruit, guava and mango break out of the can the moment it's cracked. A wave of tropical fruit overtakes your senses, followed by a balancing bitterness that leaves you with only one option... Kick back, relax and stay on Hiatus. Malts: Veloria, Vienna, Munich Hops: Galaxy Ingredients: Water, Malted Barley, Hops, Yeast, Natural Flavours About Hiatus Beers: Founded in 2022 by well known craft beer industry identities Jules Ryan and Nic Sandery, Hiatus Beers is all about brewing crisp, refreshing, full flavoured non-alcoholic beer. So if you are thinking about taking a break for a day, a week, a month or just the next round, check out our first release NAPA with all the classic Pacific Ale aromas and flavours. With Hiatus Beers, taking a break never tasted so good! SOLD AS: 4 x 375ml

name: Hiatus Beers Premium Lager - Non-Alcoholic Beer
description: A brand new beer from Hiatus! A delicious non alcoholic Premium Lager which features, crisp, easy drinking beer with smooth malts, clean bitterness with a hint of citrus for a really refreshing experience. Malts: Pislner, Vienna Hops: Hersbrucker IBU: 8 About Hiatus Beers: Founded in 2022 by well known craft beer industry identities Jules Ryan and Nic Sandery, Hiatus Beers is all about brewing crisp, refreshing, full flavoured non-alcoholic beer. So if you are thinking about taking a break for a day, a week, a month or just the next round, check out our first release NAPA with all the classic Pacific Ale aromas and flavours. With Hiatus Beers, taking a break never tasted so good! SOLD AS: 4 x 375ml

name: Mulled Red Wine Spiced Bags
description: Now you can enjoy the delicious, quick and fuss free Mulled Zero Wine with these amazing Mulled Red Wine Spiced Bags! Simply add to your choice of zero alcohol red wine, for a warm comforting beverage. Instructions: 1 spiced bag to 1 mug of red wine (250ml) or 4 spiced bags to 1 bottle (750ml). Heat in microwave for 60-90 seconds, or lightly simmer on stove for 4-5min. Do not boil. Stir well to infuse. Enjoy! We recommend Shiraz, Merlot or Malbec (alcoholic, or non-alcoholic red wine). SOLD AS: 1x Pack (10 spiced bags)

name: NEW - Gage Roads Yeah Buoy Non-Alcoholic XPA - 6 Pack
description: Welcome Gage Roads Yeah Buoy Non-Alcoholic XPA! Low in alcohol but not in flavour, Yeah Buoy is a beer you can enjoy any time, anywhere. This refreshing XPA is packed with juicy tropical aromas of papaya, peach and apricot. Medium bodied and moreish you’ll be saying "Yeah Buoy!" to another. Stay amongst it! "I love Yeah Buoy’s big fresh aroma and refreshing finish. There’s absolutely no compromise on flavour! You’ll really notice the fresh, juicy papaya and stone fruit up front, with a crisp, moreish finish. Producing a well-balanced non-alc beer is a real challenge. We had to approach recipe development and ingredient selection in a different way. There’s a few different levers we had to pull, but we’re proud we’ve ended up with a full flavoured, balanced non-alc beer." Ross Brown Head Brewer Hops: Cryo Pop and Simcoe Alcohol: Less than 0.5% Malts: Munich, Carapils, Oats and Red Back Bitterness and Colour: 14 Aroma: Papaya, peach and apricot SOLD AS: 6 x 330ml

name: NEW - Heaps Normal Third IPA - Non-Alcoholic Beer
description: NEW from Heaps Normal! This classic West Coast IPA boasts a pine-punch, amber allure and a refreshingly dry, crisp finish that cleverly cloaks the absence of booze. All wrapped up in a delightfully bitter, big, classic IPA flavour that stands out from the fruity crowd. About Heaps Normal: A designer, a brewer, a pro surfer and a ginger walk into a bar and order a round of alcohol-free beers. Sounds like the start of a joke, right? We’re a dedicated non-alcoholic beer company, brewing beer without the hangover, so you can create your own epic new normal. Its a combination of our own unique recipe, brewing method and non-traditional yeast that's responsible for creating an alcohol-free beer that tastes as good as your regular craft brew. Together we want to reduce the role of alcohol in our culture and share better stories, by turning up the volume on deliberate, inspired and creative acts and moments that make you feel alive. We’d love you to join us on your own journey toward redefining what’s possible with a clear head. We don't believe alcohol is the enemy. We’re all on our own path and we’re not here to tell you what your normal is. Whether you’re sober for a night or for life, you’re part of a booze-conscious community, trading the standard drink for a new drink standard. Whatever your story, cheers to the fact it’s heaps normal to expect a great tasting beer, without the downsides. Vegan, Alcohol Free, Preservative Free, Low Gluten. Average QTY Per 100mL Energy - 70kJ (17Cal) Protein - 0.2g Total Fat - <1g Saturated Fat - <1g Total Carbohydrate - 4g Sugars - 1.9g Dietary Fiber - 0.5g Sodium - 1mg Gluten - 14 mg/kg (ppm) SOLD AS: 4 x 375ml

name: NEW - Polka De-Alcoholised Lemoncello Spritz
description: NEW Polka’s De-Alc Limoncello Spritz offer the perfect balance of refreshing citrus and effervescent sparkling de-alc wine, making it a delightful choice for any occasion. Inspired by Italy’s beloved aperitivo culture, this alcohol-free version combines the bright zest of lemon with our crisp De-Alc Lilly Pilly Sparkling, delivering all the flavour without the alcohol. Whether you're relaxing with friends or enjoying a sunny afternoon, this light, revitalising drink is ideal for those seeking a refreshing, festive alternative. Serve chilled with a slice of lemon and a sprig of mint for the ultimate non-alcoholic indulgence. Serving Suggestions: Serve chilled with a slice of lemon and a sprig of mint for the ultimate non-alcoholic indulgence. Once opened, the sparkling should keep its fizz for up to 5 days with a champagne stopper. Ingredients: De-Alcoholised South Australian wine, South Australian Lemon juice, white wine concentrate, lemon peel extract, botanical extract blend (lemon peel, juniper, pink grapefruit, lilly pilly). name: Heaps Normal Half Day Hazy Pale Ale - Non-Alcoholic Beer
description: *NEW RELEASE FROM THE LEGENDS AT HEAPS NORMAL* Tropical sunshine in a can! Less than 0.5% ABV The Half Day Hazy, perfect for every occasion. Be it an extended holiday sesh with your pals or feet up in your favourite solo spot, this fruity hazy pale ale lets your heart escape while still letting you wrap up a hard day’s work. Whether you've got a half day off or a half day left, our tropical sunshine in a can will take you halfway to a holiday. Pairs well with yummy stuff and holds up before, during or after a few normal ones. Knock-off without the knock-ons, go to your happy place and take a half day on us. You've earned it. name: Smug AF Non Alcoholic Coconut Margarita 4 X 250ml
description: SPECIAL EDITION - LIMITED STOCK! This will be your drink of the Summer! Think a Pina Colada but brought out of the 80's and into 2024! This is a leveled-up version of the classic Pina Colada. Made with non-alcoholic coconut rum and non-alcoholic tequila, this drink is the perfect balance of sweet, citrus, and creamy. Another Smug AF nitro-dosed drink so give it a good hard shake before opening. This will give you the foamy creamy top everyone craves! About SmugAF: Smug was born with the commitment to replicate our favourite cocktails. Smug isn't about not drinking forever, it is about having choice and support for wherever you are on your journey. A safe and inclusive space to explore the AF movement and see how you feel. SOLD AS: 4 x 250ml

name: Smug AF Non Alcoholic Grapefruit Margarita 4 x 250ml
description: SPECIAL EDITION - LIMITED STOCK! Step up your cocktail game with the Smug AF Grapefruit Margarita, where tangy meets refreshing in a perfectly balanced sip. Crafted for those who crave the classic margarita experience without the alcohol, this invigorating blend of flavors delivers all the satisfaction without any of the compromise. Flavor Profile: Zesty Lime: The bold and tart taste of fresh lime juice provides the perfect base, offering a crisp and clean finish that lingers on the palate. Bright Grapefruit: A juicy burst of grapefruit adds a refreshing citrusy twist, elevating this margarita to a whole new level of delicious. Non-Alcoholic Tequila: Our specially crafted non-alcoholic tequila ensures that you get all the traditional margarita vibes with none of the hangover. At just 40 calories per can, the Smug AF Grapefruit Margarita is a guilt-free indulgence that’s perfect for any occasion. Whether you’re taking a break from alcohol or simply looking for a better beverage option, this margarita delivers full flavor without the fuzz. About SmugAF: Smug was born with the commitment to replicate our favourite cocktails.
